name: Titanium.UI.Windows
summary: Windows Phone specific UI capabilities. All properties, methods and events in this namespace will only work on Windows or Windows Phone devices.

deprecated.notes: As of Titanium 9.0.0, building Windows apps is no longer supported.

methods.name: createAppBarButton
methods.summary: Creates and returns an instance of a Titanium.UI.Windows.AppBarButton.

parameters.name: params
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Titanium.UI.Windows.AppBarButton except those marked not-creation or read-only.

methods.name: createAppBarSeparator
methods.summary: Creates a separator for the command bar.

parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Titanium.UI.Windows.AppBarToggleButton except those marked not-creation or read-only.

parameters.name: params
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Titanium.UI.Windows.CommandBar except those marked not-creation or read-only.
